name: Firewall (itch)
description:
Firewall is an action adventure game where you play as a virus in a supercomputer. You must fight your way past an antivirus and its minions to find a way to escape to the internet.

Learn about what each minion does so that you can avoid their attacks, get close, and destroy them with your sword. Fight against enemies with abilities like cloning and rapid fire ranged attacks until you get to the boss, and hopefully freedom.

- Up to 4 player co-op
- Every level is randomly generated
- Death is permanent
- Difficulty ranges from easy to extreme
- Beautiful cyber-inspired foliage and trees
- Xbox 360 controllers support
